current_version.release_notes: Hi there, unfortunately, we had to carry out unscheduled maintenance work this weekend which lasted until this afternoon and affected cloud storage access, thus no folders were visible and file upload was not possible. If you now follow the test guide provided, everything will work as expected.

description: Your free 2 GB cloud desktop! Access your files from anywhere and move them between your desktop and any mobile device! Cortado Workplace offers a free cloud desktop for every type of device! With the Cortado Workplace HTML5 client, you can easily upload files via your Mozilla Firefox browser to your Workplace directory in the cloud, enabling you to use any device to access them. Once you have signed up, you have immediate access to 2 GB of free online storage (which you can increase at any time). ADVANTAGES: - Stay flexible: Access your documents and other files at any time with your PC or Mac using the Cortado Workplace HTML5 client and with your smartphone or tablet. - Complete mobility: View, edit, print and scan your documents on the go. - Get the best of both worlds: Cortado Workplace combines local resources with cloud desktop functions adapted for your device. FEATURES: - Access your files in the cloud anytime, anywhere - Unlimited Uploading via Drag & Drop* - Preview, open, download and edit documents stored in the cloud - Easy file handling from your browser with functions such as copy, paste, rename and delete - Move or copy documents from your desktop to your Workplace account - Convenient and secure file sharing - Data-optimized file preview without downloading - Convert any file format into a PDF - Fast forwarding directly via e-mail - Zip folders or download whole folders as zipped archives - New thumbnail view for your stored files - Manage your Workplace account from your Mozilla Firefox browser and extend it by one of our Premium Services available from your Workplace management console MORE INFORMATION: View a short video about Cortado Workplace: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X5Qbumxajsk The quick guide leads you through your first steps with Cortado Workplace for PCs and Macs. View the Quick Guide: http://www.cortado.com/euen/EN/Products/CortadoWorkplace/PCMac/QuickGuide.aspx *Requires an HTML5 desktop browser such as Mozilla Firefox, Apple Safari, Google Chrome and Internet Explorer from version 9. We recommend using the latest version of your browser.

previews.caption: Access your Cortado cloud storage from your Mozilla browser - anywhere and anytime
Manage your documents in the cloud from your browser. Including convenient PDF conversion for your documents and pictures
Preview your documents without having to download them
Forward any document in your Cortado cloud storage via e-mail

name: Cortado Workplace
